text:
Fred Flintstone is the main protagonist of The Flintstones franchise. He is an everyday caveman and caring father.
Catchphrase.
His iconic phrase is "Yabba-dabba-doo". Alan Reed came up with it.
Portrayals.
Alan Reed, Henry Corden, James Arnold Taylor and Jeff Bergman have voiced him in various media. John Goodman played him in the 1994 movie.
